mapper.sql: a.project_Type, a.project_Type, a.project_Name, a.mainProject_Name, a.guanli, a.give_Date, a.give_Dept, a.startPlan_Date, a.endPlan_Date, a.buildPlace, a.guobiao, a.buildDetailPlace, a.projectAttribute, a.buildNature, a.total_Investment, a.scaleandinfo, a.siteArea, a.newSiteArea, a.farmingSiteArea, a.projectPrincipal, a.capitalSource, a.financialCapitalSource, a.isTechnically, a.putClassify, a.putCatalog, a.projectLegalDetp, a.projectLegalLicenseType, a.projectLegalLicenseNum, a.linkman, a.linktel, a.declareDate, a.projectState, a.projectCode, a.manageStatus, a.isNationalSecurity, a.investmentWay, a.otherInvestment, a.entryType, a.policyClauses, a.industryInvolved, a.totalConvertDollar, a.totalParitiesRMBorDollar, a.projectCapital, a.capitalConvertDollar, a.capitalParitiesRMBORDollar, a.newFixedAssets, a.landAcquisition, a.sumSiteArea, a.sumCoveredArea, a.isAddEquipment, a.importedEquipmentAndMoney, a.investorName, a.registerStateArea, a.contributiveLimit, a.ratioOfInvestments, a.waysOfInvestment, a.projectDeptIsBuild, a.projectDeptName, a.projectDeptType, a.businessScope, a.linkNumber, a.email, a.checkCatalog, a.checkCatalogClassify, a.project_splx, a.sfbbxm, a.lxrq, a.sumExplain
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_declare( id, project_Type, project_Name, mainProject_Name, guanli, give_Date, give_Dept, startPlan_Date, endPlan_Date, buildPlace, guobiao, buildDetailPlace, projectAttribute, buildNature, total_Investment, scaleandinfo, siteArea, newSiteArea, farmingSiteArea, projectPrincipal, capitalSource, financialCapitalSource, isTechnically, putClassify, putCatalog, projectLegalDetp, projectLegalLicenseType, projectLegalLicenseNum, linkman, linktel, declareDate, projectState, projectCode, manageStatus, isNationalSecurity, investmentWay, otherInvestment, entryType, policyClauses, industryInvolved, totalConvertDollar, totalParitiesRMBorDollar, projectCapital, capitalConvertDollar, capitalParitiesRMBORDollar, newFixedAssets, landAcquisition, sumSiteArea, sumCoveredArea, isAddEquipment, importedEquipmentAndMoney, investorName, registerStateArea, contributiveLimit, ratioOfInvestments, waysOfInvestment, projectDeptIsBuild, projectDeptName, projectDeptType, businessScope, linkNumber, email, checkCatalog, checkCatalogClassify, project_splx, sfbbxm, lxrq, sumExplain )VALUES( #{id}, #{projectType}, #{projectName}, #{mainProjectName}, #{guanli}, #{giveDate}, #{giveDept}, #{startPlanDate}, #{endPlanDate}, #{buildPlace}, #{guobiao}, #{buildDetailPlace}, #{projectAttribute}, #{buildNature}, #{totalInvestment}, #{scaleandinfo}, #{siteArea}, #{newSiteArea}, #{farmingSiteArea}, #{projectPrincipal}, #{capitalSource}, #{financialCapitalSource}, #{isTechnically}, #{putClassify}, #{putCatalog}, #{projectLegalDetp}, #{projectLegalLicenseType}, #{projectLegalLicenseNum}, #{linkman}, #{linktel}, #{declareDate}, #{projectState}, #{projectCode}, #{manageStatus}, #{isNationalSecurity}, #{investmentWay}, #{otherInvestment}, #{entryType}, #{policyClauses}, #{industryInvolved}, #{totalConvertDollar}, #{totalParitiesRMBorDollar}, #{projectCapital}, #{capitalConvertDollar}, #{capitalParitiesRMBORDollar}, #{newFixedAssets}, #{landAcquisition}, #{sumSiteArea}, #{sumCoveredArea}, #{isAddEquipment}, #{importedEquipmentAndMoney}, #{investorName}, #{registerStateArea}, #{contributiveLimit}, #{ratioOfInvestments}, #{waysOfInvestment}, #{projectDeptIsBuild}, #{projectDeptName}, #{projectDeptType}, #{businessScope}, #{linkNumber}, #{email}, #{checkCatalog}, #{checkCatalogClassify}, #{projectSplx}, #{sfbbxm}, #{lxrq}, #{sumExplain} )
mapper.update: update project_declare set bjbh = #{bjbh} where projectCode = #{projectCode}
